designs.name: Modern Supermarket
designs.description: Clean and organized supermarket with easy navigation and modern appeal
designs.lighting: Bright LED panel and linear lighting
designs.fixtures: Gondola shelving, wall racks, refrigerated units
designs.prompt_keywords: modern supermarket interior, clean grocery store design

designs.name: Large Hypermarket
designs.description: High-capacity supermarket designed for bulk shopping and high footfall
designs.walls: Neutral painted walls with promotional banners
designs.ceiling: High open ceiling with grid lighting
designs.prompt_keywords: hypermarket interior, large grocery store layout

designs.name: Neighborhood Grocery Store
designs.description: Compact and friendly supermarket for daily essentials
designs.prompt_keywords: local grocery store interior, neighborhood supermarket design

designs.name: Organic & Fresh Market
designs.description: Nature-inspired supermarket focused on organic and fresh produce
designs.prompt_keywords: organic supermarket interior, fresh market design

designs.name: Premium Gourmet Supermarket
designs.description: High-end supermarket offering gourmet and imported products
designs.prompt_keywords: premium supermarket, gourmet grocery store interior

designs.name: Warehouse Style Supermarket
designs.prompt_keywords: warehouse supermarket, bulk grocery store design

designs.name: Smart Supermarket
designs.description: Technology-driven supermarket with smart shopping experience
designs.prompt_keywords: smart supermarket, automated grocery store interior

designs.name: Family-Friendly Supermarket
designs.description: Convenient and welcoming supermarket for families
designs.prompt_keywords: family supermarket, friendly grocery store design

designs.name: Discount Supermarket
designs.description: Low-cost supermarket focused on value pricing
designs.prompt_keywords: discount supermarket interior, budget grocery store

designs.prompt_keywords: express supermarket, compact grocery store design
